title: Improving Quality in AI-Generated Code through Prompt Engineering: An Evaluation of the Impact of Prompting Techniques on Software Quality in Code Generated by
data:
M Paulsson - 2025
Abstract The use of Large Language Models (LLMs) for code generation is rapidly 
increasing. While previous investigations on the correctness of AI-generated code 
are widely present, less focus has been placed on the code's further quality attributes 
and how it can be improved. An aspect that can be equally important. This thesis 
aims to fill this gap by investigating how LLMs can be guided to generate code that 
aligns with software quality principles. Using a mixed methods approach, the study
